title: Fastest exp?
body:
Hello, I'm looking for the quickest method to level 30.
Does a 5-man pre-made team get bonus exp or was that a temporary event?
Also, which mode should I be playing?

If a 5-man pre-made team gets bonus exp, please invite me to your games.

Thank you in advance.

replies.body: take the chance to main out one character from 1-30. i find it to be the most effective methodology to moba approach. being a hybrid rts rpg etc

I'm a smurf.

There are a few approaches that work well.
1- Main 1-3 champions in multiple/all roles.
2- Main all/most champions in one or two roles.

1 is good for being flexible and filling for the team.
2 gives you more experience with those roles/champions.

I main many champions for mid/support.

How many wins does it take (roughly) to get to level 30? I'm level 10 and it's going REALLY slow already.

Bots is the best. Depending on how good you are take someone like Yi or Vayne with TP and just wreck them.

If you are trying to get to 30 fastest and not care to try out a Veigar build for late game, go with full damage runes and masteries, some lifesteal, no boots and only B when you can TP back. That would be 2 TP and game over.
Play bots and just end them quickly, although its easy to finish early giving most xp because of short game and queue times, it is boring because bots are so useless at the game.

To my knowledge the most efficient way to level to 30 is by playing TT with two others, ending games in 7 minutes (not before otherwise you don't get anything), preferably using time based and win based boosts (you get 400 RP free at level 3 [from memory] which can get you a short boost if you so desire).

And to my knowledge, the pre-made bonus XP isn't available at the moment.
